long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TimeToLeave is a productivity-focused Chrome extension designed to help users manage their work hours efficiently. With an intuitive interface and simple controls, TimeToLeave allows users to track their work hours, ensuring that they complete a healthy, 8-hour workday.

Key Features:

Customizable Arrival Time: Set the time of your arrival at work, or use the convenient buttons for common scenarios like "Now", "10mins ago", or "20mins ago" to quickly adjust your starting time.

Automatic Timer: TimeToLeave automatically starts an 8-hour timer once you input your arrival time, keeping you aware of how much time remains in your workday.

Live Countdown: Monitor the time left in your workday with a live countdown display that updates in real-time.

Start and Stop Timer: Easily start and stop the timer with dedicated buttons, allowing for flexibility in case of unexpected breaks or interruptions.

Background Functionality: TimeToLeave continues to run in the background even if the extension is closed or minimized, ensuring an accurate countdown throughout the workday.

Visual Indicators: The extension icon changes when the timer is running, providing a quick visual reference of your timer's status.

Desktop Notifications: Receive a Windows notification when your 8-hour workday is complete, reminding you that it's time to leave and maintain a healthy work-life balance.

TimeToLeave is an essential tool for professionals, freelancers, and remote workers looking to manage their work hours effectively. By providing real-time insight into your workday progress, TimeToLeave encourages a more balanced lifestyle and helps prevent burnout. Stay on top of your work schedule and take control of your time with TimeToLeave.
